Package Boundary

Class Boundary

Object
Boundary
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomeBoundary, MenuBoundary, OrderBoundary, ReservationBoundary, SalesReportBoundary, StaffBoundary
public class Boundary extends Object
Is the parent boundary class that has predefined methods to get inputs from the user.
Since:
2021-11-11
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Wong Wei Bin, Ivan Teo, Grace Wong, Goh Xue Zhe, Matthew Chua

  • Method Details

    • resetUI

      public void resetUI()
      Resets the console

    • getStringInput

      public void getStringInput​(StringObserver callback, boolean isRecurring, String stringToPrint)
      Gets a string input from the user
      Parameters:
      callback - is a function that takes in an int which corresponds to the user's choice
      isRecurring - is a bool that toggles whether to end the loop on first successful retrieval of user's choice
      stringToPrint - is a String that is being printed before user inputs their choice

    • getStringInput

      public String getStringInput()
      Gets a string input from user.
      Returns:
      string input from user

    • getUserChoices

      public void getUserChoices​(int numberOfChoices, ChoiceObserver callback, boolean isRecurring, String stringToPrint)
      Gets a choice input from user in the form of an int
      Parameters:
      numberOfChoices - is the maximum value of the int to look for ... don't include 0
      callback - is a function that takes in an int which corresponds to the user's choice
      isRecurring - is a bool that toggles whether to end the loop on first successful retrieval of user's choice
      stringToPrint - is a String that is being printed before user inputs their choice

    • getPositiveDouble

      public double getPositiveDouble()
      Gets a positive double from user
      Returns:
      positive double from user if success. Otherwise, returns 0.0

    • getPositiveInt

      public int getPositiveInt()
      Gets a positive integer
      Returns:
      positive integer

    • getUserDate

      public Date getUserDate()
      Gets date from user in dd/MM/yyyy format
      Returns:
      Date object

    • getUserMonth

      public Date getUserMonth()
      Gets month from user in MM/yyyy format
      Returns:
      Date object

    • displayResults

      public void displayResults​(String stringToPrint)
      Method that prints results and forces the user to press enter to move on.
      Parameters:
      stringToPrint - is the string that is printed.
